TopicTitle: Lost Save - Xbox One X - All Progress Lost

Articles.Content: Went to do a simple savegame in a long term game (months long).  A messge came up stating the save was corrupted, and then went ahead on it's own and deleted everything held within the saved game. Exactly the same situation as what others have written about in this message area. I am using a Xbox One X. This is such a great game, at a perfect time in aerospace history - but it continues to struggle with the most basic of function on game consoles. To whomever is responsible for development of the console version (Xbox & PS), please take a look at this issue. Thank you.
